verses.verse: It happened in the seventh<WH7637> year,<WH8141> in the fifth<WH2549> month,<WH6218> the tenth day of the month,<WH2320> that certain<WH582> of the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478> came<WH935> to inquire<WH1875> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and sat<WH3427> before me.<WH6440>
The word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to me,<WH559> saying,

Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> speak<WH1696> to the elders<WH2205> of Israel,<WH3478> and tell<WH559> them,<WH559> Thus says the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH136> Is it to inquire<WH1875> of me that you have come?<WH935> As I live,<WH2416> says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh,<WH3069> I will not be inquired of by you.<WH1875>
Will you judge<WH8199> them,<WH1121> son of man,<WH120> will you judge<WH8199> them?<WH3045> Cause them to know the abominations<WH8441> of their fathers;<WH1>

and tell<WH559> them,<WH559> Thus says the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH3069> In the day<WH3117> when I chose<WH977> Israel,<WH3478> and swore<WH3027> to<WH5375> the seed<WH2233> of the house<WH1004> of Jacob,<WH3290> and made myself known<WH3045> to them in the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> when I swore<WH3027> to<WH5375> them,<WH559> saying, I am Yahweh<WH3068> your God;<WH430>

in that day<WH3117> I swore<WH3027> to<WH5375> them,<WH3318> to bring them forth out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> into a land<WH776> that I had searched<WH8446> out for them,<WH2100> flowing with milk<WH2461> and honey,<WH1706> which is the glory<WH6643> of all lands.<WH776>

I said<WH559> to them,<WH7993> Cast away every man<WH376> the abominations<WH8251> of his eyes,<WH5869> and don't<WH2930> defile yourselves with the idols<WH1544> of Egypt;<WH4714> I am Yahweh<WH3068> your God.<WH430>

But they rebelled<WH4784> against me,<WH14> and would not listen<WH8085> to me;<WH376> they each didn't<WH7993> throw away the abominations<WH8251> of their eyes,<WH5869> neither did they forsake<WH5800> the idols<WH1544> of Egypt.<WH4714> Then I said<WH559> I would pour out<WH8210> my wrath<WH2534> on them,<WH3615> to accomplish my anger<WH639> against them in the midst<WH8432> of the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

But I worked<WH6213> for my name<WH8034>'s sake,<WH2490> that it should not be profaned in the sight<WH5869> of the nations,<WH1471> among<WH8432> which they were,<WH5869> in whose sight I made myself known<WH3045> to them,<WH3318> in bringing them forth out of the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>
So I caused them to go forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> and brought<WH935> them into the wilderness.<WH4057>
I gave<WH5414> them my statutes,<WH2708> and showed<WH3045> them my ordinances,<WH4941> which if a man<WH120> does,<WH6213> he shall live in them.<WH2425>
Moreover also I gave<WH5414> them my Sabbaths,<WH7676> to be a sign<WH226> between me and them,<WH3045> that they might know that I am Yahweh<WH3068> who sanctifies them.<WH6942>

But the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> rebelled<WH4784> against me in the wilderness:<WH4057> they didn't<WH1980> walk in my statutes,<WH2708> and they rejected<WH3988> my ordinances,<WH4941> which if a man<WH120> keep,<WH6213> he shall live<WH2425> in them;<WH7676> and my Sabbaths they greatly<WH3966> profaned.<WH2490> Then I said<WH559> I would pour out<WH8210> my wrath<WH2534> on them in the wilderness,<WH4057> to consume them.<WH3615>
But I worked<WH6213> for my name<WH8034>'s sake,<WH2490> that it should not be profaned in the sight<WH5869> of the nations,<WH1471> in whose sight<WH5869> I brought them out.<WH3318>

Moreover also I swore<WH3027> to<WH5375> them in the wilderness,<WH4057> that I would not bring<WH935> them into the land<WH776> which I had given<WH5414> them,<WH2100> flowing with milk<WH2461> and honey,<WH1706> which is the glory<WH6643> of all lands;<WH776>

because they rejected<WH3988> my ordinances,<WH4941> and didn't<WH1980> walk in my statutes,<WH2708> and profaned<WH2490> my Sabbaths:<WH7676> for their heart<WH3820> went<WH1980> after<WH310> their idols.<WH1544>
Nevertheless my eye<WH5869> spared<WH2347> them,<WH7843> and I didn't destroy them,<WH6213> neither did I make a full end<WH3617> of them in the wilderness.<WH4057>

I said<WH559> to their children<WH1121> in the wilderness,<WH4057> Don't<WH3212> walk in the statutes<WH2706> of your fathers,<WH1> neither observe<WH8104> their ordinances,<WH4941> nor defile<WH2930> yourselves with their idols.<WH1544>
I am Yahweh<WH3068> your God:<WH430> walk<WH3212> in my statutes,<WH2708> and keep<WH8104> my ordinances,<WH4941> and do them;<WH6213>
and make my Sabbaths<WH7676> holy;<WH6942> and they shall be a sign<WH226> between me and you,<WH3045> that you may know that I am Yahweh<WH3068> your God.<WH430>

But the children<WH1121> rebelled<WH4784> against me;<WH1980> they didn't walk in my statutes,<WH2708> neither kept<WH8104> my ordinances<WH4941> to do<WH6213> them,<WH120> which if a man do,<WH6213> he shall live<WH2425> in them;<WH2490> they profaned my Sabbaths.<WH7676> Then I said<WH559> I would pour out<WH8210> my wrath<WH2534> on them,<WH3615> to accomplish my anger<WH639> against them in the wilderness.<WH4057>

Nevertheless I withdrew<WH7725> my hand,<WH3027> and worked<WH6213> for my name<WH8034>'s sake,<WH2490> that it should not be profaned in the sight<WH5869> of the nations,<WH1471> in whose sight<WH5869> I brought them forth.<WH3318>
Moreover I swore<WH3027> to<WH5375> them in the wilderness,<WH4057> that I would scatter<WH6327> them among the nations,<WH1471> and disperse<WH2219> them through the countries;<WH776>

because they had not executed<WH6213> my ordinances,<WH4941> but had rejected<WH3988> my statutes,<WH2708> and had profaned<WH2490> my Sabbaths,<WH7676> and their eyes<WH5869> were after<WH310> their fathers<WH1>' idols.<WH1544>
Moreover also I gave<WH5414> them statutes<WH2706> that were not good,<WH2896> and ordinances<WH4941> in which they should not live;<WH2421>

and I polluted<WH2930> them in their own gifts,<WH4979> in that they caused to pass through<WH5674> the fire all that opens<WH6363> the womb,<WH7356> that I might make them desolate,<WH8074> to the end that they might know<WH3045> that I am Yahweh.<WH3068>

Therefore,<WH1121> son of man,<WH120> speak<WH1696> to the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> and tell<WH559> them,<WH559> Thus says the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH3069> In this moreover have your fathers<WH1> blasphemed<WH1442> me,<WH4603> in that they have committed a trespass against me.<WH4604>

For when I had brought<WH935> them into the land,<WH776> which I swore<WH3027> to<WH5375> give<WH5414> to them,<WH7200> then they saw every high<WH7311> hill,<WH1389> and every thick<WH5687> tree,<WH6086> and they offered<WH2076> there their sacrifices,<WH2077> and there they presented<WH5414> the provocation<WH3708> of their offering;<WH2076> there also they made<WH7760> their pleasant<WH5207> aroma,<WH7381> and they poured out<WH5258> there their drink offerings.<WH5262>
Then I said<WH559> to them,<WH1116> What does the high place where you go<WH935> mean?<WH8034> So its name is called<WH7121> Bamah<WH1117> to this day.<WH3117>

Therefore tell<WH559> the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH136> Do you pollute<WH2930> yourselves in the way<WH1870> of your fathers?<WH1> and do you play the prostitute<WH2181> after<WH310> their abominations?<WH8251>

and when you offer<WH5375> your gifts,<WH4979> when you make your sons<WH1121> to pass through<WH5674> the fire,<WH784> do you pollute<WH2930> yourselves with all your idols<WH1544> to this day?<WH3117> and shall I be inquired<WH1875> of by you,<WH1004> house of Israel?<WH3478> As I live,<WH2416> says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh,<WH3069> I will not be inquired of by you;<WH1875>

and that which comes<WH5927> into your mind<WH7307> shall not be at all,<WH559> in that you say, We will be<WH1961> as the nations,<WH1471> as the families<WH4940> of the countries,<WH776> to serve<WH8334> wood<WH6086> and stone.<WH68>

As I live,<WH2416> says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh,<WH3069> surely with a mighty<WH2389> hand,<WH3027> and with an outstretched<WH5186> arm,<WH2220> and with wrath<WH2534> poured out,<WH5186> will I be king over you:<WH4427>

and I will bring you out<WH3318> from the peoples,<WH5971> and will gather<WH6908> you out of the countries<WH776> in which you are scattered,<WH6327> with a mighty<WH2389> hand,<WH3027> and with an outstretched<WH5186> arm,<WH2220> and with wrath<WH2534> poured out;<WH8210>
and I will bring<WH935> you into the wilderness<WH4057> of the peoples,<WH5971> and there will I enter into judgment<WH8199> with you face<WH6440> to face.<WH6440>

Like as I entered into judgment<WH8199> with your fathers<WH1> in the wilderness<WH4057> of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> so will I enter into judgment<WH8199> with you,<WH5002> says the Lord<WH136> Yahweh.<WH3069>
I will cause you to pass<WH5674> under the rod,<WH7626> and I will bring<WH935> you into the bond<WH4562> of the covenant;<WH1285>

and I will purge out<WH1305> from among you the rebels,<WH4775> and those who disobey<WH6586> against me;<WH3318> I will bring them forth out of the land<WH776> where they live,<WH4033> but they shall not enter<WH935> into the land<WH127> of Israel:<WH3478> and you shall know<WH3045> that I am Yahweh.<WH3068>

As for you,<WH1004> house of Israel,<WH3478> thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH3069> Go,<WH3212> serve<WH5647> everyone<WH376> his idols,<WH1544> and hereafter<WH310> also,<WH8085> if you will not listen to me;<WH6944> but my holy name<WH8034> you shall no more profane<WH2490> with your gifts,<WH4979> and with your idols.<WH1544>

For in my holy<WH6944> mountain,<WH2022> in the mountain<WH2022> of the height<WH4791> of Israel,<WH3478> says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh,<WH3069> there shall all the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> all of them,<WH5647> serve me in the land:<WH776> there will I accept<WH7521> them,<WH1875> and there will I require your offerings,<WH8641> and the first fruits<WH7225> of your offerings,<WH4864> with all your holy things.<WH6944>

As a pleasant<WH5207> aroma<WH7381> will I accept<WH7521> you,<WH3318> when I bring you out from the peoples,<WH5971> and gather<WH6908> you out<WH3318> of the countries<WH776> in which you have been scattered;<WH6327> and I will be sanctified<WH6942> in you in the sight of the nations.<WH1471>

You shall know<WH3045> that I am Yahweh,<WH3068> when I shall bring<WH935> you into the land<WH127> of Israel,<WH3478> into the country<WH776> which I swore<WH3027> to<WH5375> give<WH5414> to your fathers.<WH1>

There you shall remember<WH2142> your ways,<WH1870> and all your doings,<WH5949> in which you have polluted<WH2930> yourselves;<WH6962> and you shall loathe yourselves in your own sight<WH6440> for all your evils<WH7451> that you have committed.<WH6213>

You shall know<WH3045> that I am Yahweh,<WH3068> when I have dealt<WH6213> with you for my name<WH8034>'s sake,<WH7451> not according to your evil ways,<WH1870> nor according to your corrupt<WH7843> doings,<WH5949> you house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh.<WH3069>
The word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to me,<WH559> saying,

Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> set<WH7760> your face<WH6440> toward<WH1870> the south,<WH8486> and drop<WH5197> your word toward the south,<WH1864> and prophesy<WH5012> against the forest<WH3293> of the field<WH7704> in the South;<WH5045>

and tell<WH559> the forest<WH3293> of the South,<WH5045> Hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of Yahweh:<WH3068> Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh,<WH3068> Behold,<WH3341> I will kindle a fire<WH784> in you,<WH398> and it shall devour every green<WH3892> tree<WH6086> in you,<WH3002> and every dry tree:<WH6086> the flaming<WH3852> flame<WH7957> shall not be quenched,<WH3518> and all faces<WH6440> from the south<WH5045> to the north<WH6828> shall be burnt thereby.<WH6866>
All flesh<WH1320> shall see<WH7200> that I,<WH3068> Yahweh, have kindled<WH1197> it;<WH3518> it shall not be quenched.
Then I said,<WH559> Ah<WH162> Lord<WH136> Yahweh!<WH136> they say<WH559> of me,<WH4911> Isn't he a speaker of parables?<WH4912>
